kDesc
Skaters, Goths, Punks, Emo Kids, and now Cybergoths. No one brings you street fashions quite like Delirious Squid. [#Legal]
Skaters, gothiques, punks, emos et maintenant Cybergoth. Personne ne vous propose la mode de la rue comme Delirious Squid. [#Legal]
Skater, Goths, Punks, Emos und nun auch Cybergoths. Keiner bietet bessere Straßenmode als Delirious Squid. [#Legal]
Skater, goth, punk, emo e ora anche cybergoth. Nessuno crea abbigliamento da strada come Delirious Squid. [#Legal]
Skaters, góticos, punks, emos y ahora los cibergóticos. Nadie sabe más de moda callejera que Delirious Squid. [#Legal]
